action_item: Users & Roles - Personalize the application settings for improved user experience.
notes: Focus on changing the landing page to calendar or inbox for efficiency.

action_item: Users & Roles - Uncheck the legacy search box to enhance patient record search capabilities.
notes: This allows for more precise searches by combining first name, last name, and gender.

action_item: Security - Change the main login password for enhanced security.
notes: Use the Change Password option in the main settings tab.

action_item: Security - Update the eSignature ID for electronic document signing.
notes: Follow the two-step process to validate current ID before creating a new one.

action_item: Security - Update the visual signature for documents.
notes: Validate eSignature ID before drawing a new signature.

action_item: Reports - Customize clinical document templates using CCDA standards.
notes: Select which patient chart pieces to include and arrange them in desired order.
